ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I might leave a trail in the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🐌 I am much slower than a rabbit.
🥬 I like to eat plants sometimes.

ocean.question: I am a big body of salty water. Ships sail on me and whales live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth.
🏖️ You can build sandcastles near me.
🐠 Many creatures call me home.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish with a funny name, often found in a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am orange and white.
🤡 My name is like a type of entertainer.
🏠 I live in a stinging plant.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a car.
🎵 I communicate with other using sounds.
🌬️ I have a blowhole on my head.

ocean.question: I'm a creature with eight arms, living in the ocean. I can squeeze through tight spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change my color to hide.
🧠 I'm very smart!

ocean.question: I am a type of rock that's made from the skeletons of tiny sea creatures, and can build up to create islands. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am white and sometimes pink.
🏝️ Many colorful fish live near me.
⏳ It takes a very long time to form.

ocean.question: I am a current that starts near the equator and brings warm water up the East Coast of the US. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆️ I move from south to north.
🇺🇸 I affect the weather of a country.
☀️ I am named after a body of water.

ocean.question: I am the term for the measure of how much salt is dissolved in water, and the ocean has a lot of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧂 I make seawater taste different from fresh water.
🌊 The Dead Sea has a very high amount of me.
🧪 Scientists measure me using special tools.

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean where sunlight does not reach, but life still thrives near hydrothermal vents. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 It is very dark where I am.
🌋 Heat comes from inside the earth to keep me warm.
🕳️ I'm often at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a circular movement of ocean currents, created by wind patterns and the Earth's rotation. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can affect the climate of continents.
🧭 I'm found in all major oceans.
🔄 I spin like a giant whirlpool.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I often stop to pick people up.
📍 I have a specific route.
🎟️ You usually need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You should always wear a helmet when riding me.
🚴 I am powered by you.
🔔 I might have a bell to warn people I'm coming.

transport.question: I travel on water and carry people or goods across seas and oceans. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I float.
🌊 I am bigger than a canoe.
🚢 I might have sails or a motor.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: 🛩️ I have wings.
☁️ I fly high above the clouds.
✈️ You need a ticket to board me.

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry many passengers at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a set path.
🔔 I often travel through cities.
⏱️ I can be very fast.

transport.question: I’m a building where planes take off and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I have a tower to control air traffic.
🌍 I am busy and filled with many people.
🧳 People travel all over the world from here.

transport.question: I travel under the sea, allowing people to explore the ocean depths. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am a watercraft that dives underwater
🤿 I'm used for exploration.
🔦 I have to be watertight.

transport.question: I am a type of car that can take you anywhere, on or off the road. What am I?

hints.text: ⛰️ I am perfect for going on adventures and exploring
🛣️ You can drive me on the road or take me off the road
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I often have lots of space for passengers

transport.question: I have blades that spin around and help me fly straight up. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🏥 I'm sometimes used for medical emergencies.
🚨 You often see me in a movie or a show.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that travels to space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I can fly to the Moon.
🌌 I am very fast.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
